Entry.JapaneseText: くぅう、なんて堅苦しい街なんだ!!
男女間の会話もそうだけど、あれしちゃいけない、 これしちゃいけないっていうのが多いわね。
Entry.EnglishText: Not only are men and women unable to converse, there are many other actions that are prohibited as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱり人は 心のままに生きるってのが、一番だぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Well, after all, it's best for people follow their hearts!

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、みんなが勝手に生きてたら困ります。 やっぱり我慢も必要ですよ。
Entry.EnglishText: But if everyone were to live selfish lives, that would cause problems. Self-restraint is important as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: まあ、ほどほどに、って事よね。 そういうのが一番難しいんだけど。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, all things in moderation, as they say. Although that's the most difficult way to live.
